DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of assessment made by CRA (person who is employed by a study sponsor or by a contract research organization (CRO), operates independently from the clinical study site and functions as a monitor, and/or auditor, and/or a project director within a particular trial or institution).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related assessment made by CRA (person who is employed by a study sponsor or by a contract research organization (CRO), operates independently from the clinical study site and functions as a monitor, and/or auditor, and/or a project director within a particular trial or institution).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Person employed by a study sponsor or Contract Research Organization to monitor a clinical study at all participating sites. (from centerwatch.com glossary)

Concepts.definition: A person who is employed by a study sponsor or by a contract research organization (CRO), operates independently from the clinical study site and functions as a monitor, and/or auditor, and/or a project director within a particular trial or institution.

Property.preferredDefinition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
